classes.name: select
classes.description: Container around the entire select menu

classes.name: select__label
classes.description: Makes the select width smaller to fit an icon label

classes.name: select__icon-label
classes.description: Class for an icon label

classes.name: select__value-container
classes.description: Wrapping class for the contents of the input

classes.name: select__value
classes.description: Inline wrapping class for displayed, selected value(s)

classes.name: select__value-label
classes.description: Select label class for displayed, selected value(s)

classes.name: select__container
classes.description: Wrapping class for the select component

classes.name: select__single
classes.description: Class to indicate the menu can only select a single option

classes.name: select__multiple
classes.description: Class to indicate the menu can select multiple options

classes.name: select__two-column-layout
classes.description: Class to indicate that dropdown panel is split into two columns

classes.name: select__multiple-check-icon-wrapper
classes.description: Class to wrap the check svg icon for multiple select

classes.name: select__multiple-check-icon
classes.description: Class for svg icon for multiple select

classes.name: select__multiple-hide-check-icon
classes.description: Class to indicate check icon is not visible when option is not selected

classes.name: select__placeholder
classes.description: Wrapping class for the placeholder text

classes.name: select__input
classes.description: Wrapper around the text input itself

classes.name: select__panel-header-input
classes.description: Wrapping class for the input element when search or filter is enabled

classes.name: select__panel-header-input-icon
classes.description: Wrapping class for the button in the search input

classes.name: select__panel-header-input-icon--clear
classes.description: Modifier class when the icon is a clear icon (when a value exists for search input)

classes.name: select__arrow-wrapper
classes.description: Wrapper around the arrow icon

classes.name: select__arrow
classes.description: The arrow icon itself

classes.name: select__clear-wrapper
classes.description: Produces an "x" icon inside the main input field

classes.name: select__clear
classes.description: Wrapper class around the "x" icon

classes.name: select__spinner-zone
classes.description: Class for loading styles

classes.name: select--disabled
classes.description: Modifier to set disabled classes on the component

classes.name: select--dark
classes.description: Modifier to set dark color class on the svg icon

classes.name: select--error
classes.description: Modifier to set error classes on the component

classes.name: select--bottom
classes.description: Modifier to position the dropdown panel under the select

classes.name: select--non-placeholder-clear-option
classes.description: To style '- - -' clear option when placeholder is not present

classes.name: select--top
classes.description: Modifier to position the dropdown panel above the select

classes.name: select--open
classes.description: Modifier to set the style for an open state

classes.name: select--search
classes.description: Modifier to set the style for focus state (for search component css-only)

classes.name: select--focused
classes.description: Modifier to set the style for a focused state

classes.name: select--has-value
classes.description: Modifier to indicate that the input has a value

classes.name: select__dropdown-panel
classes.description: Wrapping class for the dropdown panel

classes.name: select__dropdown-panel--open
classes.description: Modifier to set the dropdown panel as open

classes.name: select__dropdown-panel-items
classes.description: Wrapping class to contain all the dropdown panel items

classes.name: select__option
classes.description: Wrapping class for an individual option with the dropdown panel

classes.name: select__option--marked
classes.description: Modifier class to set an option to marked

classes.name: select__option--selected
classes.description: Modifier class to set an option to selected

classes.name: select__option--highlighted
classes.description: Modifier class to highlight searched text

classes.name: select__option--disabled
classes.description: Modifier class to set an option to disabled

classes.name: select__option-label
classes.description: Inline class for the option label

classes.name: select__option-label--placeholder
classes.description: Modifier class to set on clearable option label

classes.name: select__option-label--description-column
classes.description: Modifier class to set on option description (2nd column) label

classes.name: select__option-label-fixed
classes.description: class for the fixed description label

classes.name: select__option-icon
classes.description: class to add right padding to icon in option label

classes.name: select__icon-option-label
classes.description: class to add ellipses on text-overflow in option label

classes.name: select__option-wrapper
classes.description: class to align icon and label

classes.name: select__icon--left
classes.description: Moves the select icon left only when using the css only assisted search option

classes.name: select__icon--value
classes.description: Changes the color of an eds-icon when the dropdown has a background color

classes.name: select__icon--hide
classes.description: Hides the select icon

description: UI select component to choose option from a dropdown list.
name: Select
